info.author: Denis Khodus
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Mozilla Public License 2.0 (MPL 2.0)
Topic :: System :: Systems Administration :: Authentication/Directory :: LDAP
info.description: Simple Active Directory console-based management toolkit (CLI - command line interface) which is designed to execute basic administration of MSAD like creating, modifying, listing, deleting and searching users, groups, computers; printing and managing domain tree structure and so on. The point of this toolkit creation was to give to system administrators an ability to easily manage Samba4-based AD domains (when there is no ability to use GUI MS management console and samba utilities (samba-tool, ldbsearch and so on) are not comfortable to use.
info.keywords: ad active directory samba manage console cli
info.name: adsmt
